name: Snow Place Like Home (necrosaint, Theonlyrio, Ryanb2505, Coranico)
name_original: Snow Place Like Home (necrosaint, Theonlyrio, Ryanb2505, Coranico)
description:
Our submission to the Weekly Game Jam #152. Theme: Shelter

Credits

All names below did bits of everything, but our primary responsiblies were:

  • Dan Perry: Programming, Level Design, UI Design, SFX, Particle Systems
  • James Lucas : Project Lead, Programming, VFX
  • Matt McCurdy: Level Design
  • Rio Kisjantoro: 3D models, Level Design
  • Ryan Baylis: Programming, Music, SFX

Game Play

You play as Chungus the Snowman. In each level, Chungus collects snow and builds his igloo home. Along the way, Chungus avoids melty sun beams and traverses dangerous mountain paths.

We included 3 playable levels in the game (including a minimal tutorial level).
